desc: Ellywell exists to help moms give their kiddos a safer, healthier alternative to traditional Acetaminophen (aka “Tylenol”). Naturally flavored, safe & sugar-free (naturally sweetened with Stevia), Ellywell is a fever and pain reducer designed with the best parents in mind.

layout.text: Sugar-free, dye-free, naturally-flavored fever and pain reducer for your littles.
